article_title: Lilly, Merck and Valeant Receive Inquiries About Drug Pricing
article_text:
The Justice Department has ratcheted up the scrutiny of drug-pricing practices with a new round of inquiries over how pharmaceutical companies report product prices to the government Medicaid program.

The U.S. Attorney’s Office for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania and the Justice Department’s civil division are seeking information from Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc. and Eli Lilly & Co. about how they calculate and...

twitter.description: Drug makers Eli Lilly, Valeant and Merck have disclosed separate requests from the U.S. Justice Department for information related to drug pricing—the latest sign of increased scrutiny of the industry’s pricing practices.
twitter.title: Lilly, Merck and Valeant Receive Inquiries About Drug Pricing

image.alt: Lilly, Merck and Valeant receive inquiries from Justice Department over drug pricing

twitter.creator: @Loftus
